00066     enum EditType
00067     {
00068       LineEdit,
00069       UniqueValues,
00070       UniqueValuesEditable,
00071       ValueMap,
00072       Classification,
00073       EditRange,
00074       SliderRange,
00075       CheckBox,    /* added in 1.4 */
00076       FileName,
00077       Enumeration,
00078       Immutable,   /* The attribute value should not be changed in the attribute form*/
00079       Hidden,      /* The attribute value should not be shown in the attribute form @added in 1.4 */
00080       TextEdit,    /* multiline edit @added in 1.4*/
00081       Calendar,    /* calendar widget @added in 1.5 */
00082       DialRange,   /* dial range @added in 1.5 */
00083     };
00084 
00085     struct RangeData

00090

00092       QVariant mMax;
00093       QVariant mStep;
00094     };
